note.p: Birth: Gate Burton, Lincolnshire, England, United Kingdom (16 November 1836)
Death: At sea, near Cape Town, South Africa, Africa (27 October 1905)
Burial: At sea, near Cape Town, South Africa
Career: Captain, Royal Engineers; Professor of Geology, Canterbury College, Christchurch, New Zealand
Memberships: FGS; CMZS; Cor du Mus d'Hist Nat Paris; Cor Mem Roy Soc Tas; Hon Mem Roy Soc NSW; Cor Aead Nat Sci Philad; Cor Ornith Ver Wien; Cor K K Geol Reichsanst Wien
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1907 vol 79 pp xli-xliv
References: Robin J H Clark and Michael J Kelly, 'New Zealand, New Zealanders and the Royal Society' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 263-281
